body:
Comment 10: 
@9: Please note that godoc.org, regardless of it being awesome, is not yet a good enough
replacement of Go-wiki-projects; also b/c:

- The index is pretty temporal. Non highly popular stuff is mostly invisible there.
- Commands, in contrast to packages, are second (actually rather Nth) class citizens
(eg. not indexed at all, AFAICS).

Sorry for not being constructive - as I don't have a better than status quo
recommendation.
